traits.description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **2** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **12%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **3** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **18%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.
